value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #08: Create subsets of your data with calculated tables in Power Bi
value.excerpt: Learn how to create subsets of your data with calculated tables in Power Bi.  Calculated tables are also useful for checking your DAX measures, check the video to learn how. :)   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.excerpt: I showed you on last monday's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uX3_dnb5on0 how to do running totals in power query, and in this video I will show you how to do it but by subcategory or group.  Fingers crossed I managed to explain myself!! :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server  In this video, I walk through the steps to create your Power BI Report in order to publish it to Power BI Report Server. This involves downloading and installing Power BI Desktop optimized for Power BI Report Server and connecting to Analysis Services

value.title: Debugging a slow Power BI report with Phil Seamark
value.excerpt: Phil sits down with us to walk through his process in debugging a slow Power BI report. This uses some new features in Power BI Desktop as well as using DAX Studio to get further insights. value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!
value.excerpt: Think you need to always refresh your Power BI dataset even why just adding a measure? Patrick shows how you can deploy schema changes without needing to perform the refresh with Power BI Premium and the ALM Toolkit.  ALM Toolkit: http://alm-toolkit.com/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Dynamic labels in Power BI using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick uses a little DAX, and the SelectedValue function, to get you some dynamic labels in your Power BI reports. value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to dynamically filter by today's date. Using a date table, you can create a DAX measure that can then be used as a Power BI report-level filter to dynamically filter by today's date within Power BI Desktop.be  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: How to Easily Change the Data Source Type in Power BI
